sentences.en: And now for your further delectation, we present a selection of popular melodies.
sentences.cn: 为使你们更加愉快, 我们奉献给你们一组精选的流行歌曲.

sentences.en: Choose the rattan farmland, spend the delectation and comfortable time.
sentences.cn: 选择藤田，度过愉快与舒适的时光。

sentences.cn: 同许多公司 、 企业保持了 长期 的、愉快的合作.

sentences.en: She makes scones and cakes for the delectation of visitors.
sentences.cn: 她烘制了烤饼和蛋糕供客人享用。

sentences.en: Today is Mother's Day and wish all mother festival delectation in the world!
sentences.cn: 今天是母亲节,祝世界上所有的母亲节日愉快!

trans.tran_en: if you do something for someone’s delectation, you do it to give them enjoyment, pleasure, or amusement
